1.content:
The last thing you remember was receiving an email that asked you if you wanted to have a fun time, you didn't even respond to it, you just sarcastically said "Sure" out loud before a flash of light blinded you. Now you feel horrible, like you were spun around in a washing machine or something. The only thing you can hear is what sounds like an insects fluttering wings, followed by someone poking you, although you could have swore it was more like a punch. You swat at whatever hit you, only to hit thin air. Doing that must have been funny, because you then heard a girlish giggle coming from all around you as you slowly opened your eyes.

"Hey! He's waking up now! I think you poked him too hard Anny."

Once you opened your eyes and sat up, all you could say to yourself was "Wow" (Not that anyone heard you at your size)
All you could see were the curvy bodies of the Nymph sisters from Rayman Origins, but they were giant sized!

"Who gets him when though?" "I think I should get him first!" "He does look pretty cute..."

Finally, Betilla pushed her way through her sisters and gently offered to pick you up. You kindly accepted her offer and stepped into the palm of her hand.
"I think I should explain his situation first though" Betilla said as she stared down at you. "That'd be nice, like how and why I'm here!" You said, talking loudly so you could be heard.
"I'll explain everything little one, me aand my sisters have grown bored lately, and decided that maybe a small human would be able to provide some entertainment." This answer bewildered you. "So you kidnapped me and shrunk me down?" Betilla however, shook her head. "No of course not, we sent an offer to whoever would accept it, and you accepted it."

"That's the last time I think out loud." You thought to yourself as you sat down in Betillas hand. "So what, are you all going to play with me like a toy?" you asked rather grumpily.
"Well, yes that was the idea in the first place. But not to worry though, we put a spell on you that makes you.. what do humans call it? Like putty?"
You groaned. "Great. Now I'm a plaything for these girls." You thought to yourself as you looked out of the corner of your eye, seeing Betilla's sisters huddled around her hand. "Well, maybe it's not all bad."

"Of course, once we have our fun, you're free to go home if you choose. And we'll take good care of you." Betilla finished.

"Yeah! So let's get started!" One of the sisters shouted as she attempted to grab you, which resulted in a big scrap between the sisters. You flopped onto the floor and rubber the back of your head. It really didn't hurt as much as you thought it would. As you stood up and turned around, you attempted to calm the sisters down. "Ladies please! Stop all the fighting, you're giving me a headache!" you yelled, however your yelling fell on deaf ears. Finally, Helena, the Nymph dressed in what looked like a snow dress, shoved Edith to the ground.
It's too bad she shoved Edith in your direction, which resulted in you getting flattened by her plump rear end.

After Edith dusted herself off, the girls looked around realizing you were gone. "Uh, where did he go?" Edith asked as she turned around to look for you. The rest of the sisters giggled as Edith turned her head. "What's wrong?"

Annetta was the first to point straight at Ediths rear, revealing you plastered over it, just like someone had sat in putty. "I guess he's already having fun." Edith said as she peeled you off her skirt, which resulted in you reflating fast.

"Now that all of the fighting is over, let's discuss who gets our toy first."

After a long talk, it's decided that...
1.title: Waking up in this crazy world.

11.content: And what does she do to ya?
11.title: Betilla gets you first.

choices: "Kick back and relax before we play."
"I mean, I give you some more time between these?"
12.content:
"Maybe I could get him first?" Helena asked as she snatched you from Ediths hand, making you get a bit of motion sickness in the process. "Just make sure you take care of him, he might be under a spell but he can still...well kick the bucket." Betilla said as you gulped a bit at that statement. "I'll take good care of him, you know that!" Helena snapped back as she fluttered up into the air, getting ready to depart. "Just make sure you give him to me tomorrow, in one piece." Betilla said as Helena nodded and started to fly back to her home in the mountains, with you in tow.

The snowy mountain tops stretched for miles, with Helena's house sitting at what seemed the center of the collection. Your casual clothes were definitely not enough to withstand the cold weather, you felt like you were turning into an ice cube! You can only suspect that since Helena is the mountain nymph, she must have natural resistance to cold weather. As Helena fluttered into her house, she sat down on her couch and lifted you up to her face. At this point, you were shaking like a leaf in a hurricane. Helena looked at you for a moment and frowned. "I'm so sorry! I forgot that you're a human, not a nymph like me! You must be close to becoming an ice cube!" Helena said as she continued to watch you shiver. An idea popped into her head as she smirked at you. "I know how to warm you up, and I bet you'll love this idea!" Helena said as she cupped you in both her hands and hugged you against her ample chest.
Helena's body heat slowly began warming you up, you were so comfy that you couldn't help cuddle into her. You heard her giggling as you did this, and looked up at her face.
"You really like it down there huh? I suppose I could let you stay there for a bit longer." Helena said as she sat back a bit and relaxed.

You did the same as you made yourself comfortable between Helena's endowments, finally feeling totally warmed up again. Enduring the cold weather was really worth it. Your world shifted a ton as you noticed Helena cupping her breasts, another smirk on her face. You were about to ask her what she was doing, but then both of her breasts crashed into you and crushed you between them. Helena laughed as you crawled out from in between them, and apologized. "I'm sorry, I just couldn't resist!" Helena laughed out as she pet you on your head with her index finger.

"Listen little guy, how about we..."
12.title: Helena Handbasket

choices: "Climb up me to get your food!"
13.content:
"Can I please get him first?" Edith pleaded, everyone looking skeptical. "Weren't you and Helena a bit rough with your dolls back in the day?" Holly asked as you sat down in Edith's hand.
"So I'm a doll now?" you sighed as Edith nervously avoided Holly's question. "Well, you're doll sized aren't you?" Betilla said with a smile as you simply sighed in defeat.
"Well, I suppose he can go with Edith first. They've got quite a bond already as it seems." Annetta giggled as the other sisters finally agreed.

Edith squealed with delight and hugged you like you were her newest toy. (Which in a sense, you are.) Being hugged by a bubbly girl like Edith has it's perks. Especially being in between her warm mounds. But, there are also downsides. Like suffocating. You violently struggled to get out of Ediths cleavage, grabbing her by instinct and trying to pull yourself out. It was a nice spot sure, but not when you can die while enjoying it. "Hey! You're grabby!" Edith said as she continued to hug you, seeming to not really care. "Edith, I think that's because you're suffocating him!" Betilla said as she pulled Edith's arms away from her chest, leaving you imprinted once again on her. "Oops! Sorry!" Edith said as she peeled you off of her right breast.
"If you're going to do that again, please make sure you give me some air!" You shouted. "Sorry! Don't worry, I'll take care of you while you're with me!" Edith reassured, as she began to fly off. "Cya later girls!" Edith said as she flew back to her home. "Just be sure to give her to Holly tomorrow!" Betilla shouted as Edith flew away with you in tow.


As Edith settled into her home, she set you down on the floor, leaving the room for a minute and coming back with a sandwich. She settled down on her chair and began eating it, when your stomach growled. "Wow, you must be hungry if I heard that from up here!" Edith said in between mouthfuls of food. "Tell you what, I'll let you have some of my lunch if you can do a task. If not, you'll have to wait for your meal." You reluctantly agreed, not like you had a choice. You were hungry.

"Alrighty then, I want you to.."
13.title: Edith Up

choices: You managed to tap her nose...
You accidentally slipped in her mouth
131.content:
Edith took a quick pause to take another bite of her sandwich,and turn her chair to face towards you.

"I want you to climb up me to get your food!"She said,taking another bite of her sandwich.

Is she serious?You're only 4 to 5 inches tall!How can she expect you to climb up her,when you can easily fall off and hurt yourself.However,if you don't agree,you have to listen to your stomach sing tunes,while you wait to get fed like a baby.

"Okay,how far do I have to climb up your body?"You asked,kind of wishing you didn't,but again you were forced to.

"All you have to do is reach my nose."Edith said,wiggling and pointing to her nose.That was going to be tiring,but you really didn't feel like climbing from the ground up to her nose.You can't tell if the hunger is affecting your thoughts,or are you truly thinking it.

"Ah,come on,"You complained."Can't I just sit in your lap or something?"You placed yourself near her foot,waiting for her answer.

"Nope,my task is made up.Oh,and another thing,"Edith leaned over in her chair,so she can see you."You have to do it before I finish this sandwich,or I might get too full to bring you food."She giggled at your facial reaction,which was basically an enormous frown,with you eyebrows aiming downwards.The sandwich is already half eaten,and considering that she may have a higher gluttony than her sisters,it could be a matter of seconds before she fully ingested the sandwich.

This isn't the time for getting angry,now it's the time to get climbing!One slight problem...you have no experience in climbing large objects.You couldn't even climb the tree in your front yard,without someone helping you.You had no choice,but to start climbing raw.You decided that you need to get a grip,despite her rather tender body,so you tried to warp your legs and arms around her legs.Okay,you managed to not slip downwards,until the vibrations of Edith up giggling caused you to slip,and eventually land back on the ground.

"Oh,sorry,you're just so ticklish."She giggled.

Oh boy,this is gonna take a while...a long while.

*********

Oh...man...What.A.Challenge.

It felt like you took at least a good 3 hours or so,to get at least 2/3 of the way there.You managed to reach her...rather pillow like mounds before having to lie down and take a break.Again,being with a woman like Edith Up does have it's perks and downsides,like her constant giggling hindering your progress.

"Glad to see your determination for food,kind of like me."Edith Up said,grinning at you.You roll on your stomach and face her.

"Great...can I have some food now?"You asked,as your stomach gave off another growl.She just shook her head.

"Ah-ah-ah...you didn't touch my nose yet,and lucky for you,I still have this little piece left."She raised one of her,revealing a very tiny piece of her sandwich.Alright,you made it!Or...at least you did...

She slowly raised the tiny piece of food over her head,and opened her mouth.She then lowered it closer to her mouth,ever so slowly.She isn't seriously teasing you like that!It doesn't matter,you were too hungry to wait,and your not about to lose after you've come this far!

You made a mad dash towards her nose,across what seemed like a field of orb-like flesh...
131.title: Climbing Mt.Fleshmore

choices: Try to pry open her mouth
1313.content:
You run across the nymph's mountain sized chest, hoping to reach her nose as quickly as possible before she goes along with her tease and eats the last bit of her sandwich.

when you reach to her chin, you put as much strength as you can into your legs and you jump as high as you could, arm reaching out for her nose. The distance is swiftly closing in, her nose is right at your fingertips! You're going to make it!

But all of that excitement within your dwindles away as you feel your right foot getting caught on Edith's lower lip, you swipe your hand in the air to touch her nose but find that you are but a centimeter too short. You then notice the large gap of Edith's mouth below you as you fall inside.

*GLOMPH*

"Mmmph!?" Your body falling within her mouth startles the busty blonde making her instinctively close her mouth around you.

Around you, you can only see the pink, wet insides of her mouth. Her pearly white teeth blocking your only exit. You can feel her wet and squishy tongue as you plant your hands on it to try and stand up and get your balance.

"Hey!" You yell to get her attention "Let me out of here!"

You notice that Edith doesn't do anything right away so you take matters into your own hands.

You...
1313.title: Unsuspecting A Tasty Snack

14.content:
"Well, Anny was the first to find him when he got 'lost' so I think she should get him first." Everyone reluctantly agreed. Annetta took you carefully from Edith and began discussing your schedule with the others.

"Ok, so it'll be me, then Helena, then Holly, then Edith, and finally Betilla. That sound good?" Annetta asked, and everyone agreed on the schedule. Annetta soon left and brought you to the pier. You looked down from her hand and saw the blue water rippling below. "Uhh, what are we doing here, Miss Annetta?" You asked Annetta as you looked up at her, you had to admit something about the sea air made her sparkle with even more beauty. "Well, I am the ocean nymph. My house is at the bottom of the sea, so you might want to hold on!" Annetta said as she dove into the ocean, you in her hand. The rush of water felt a bit painful at your size, but you managed to hold on to her index finger as you both drifted down to the bottom of the ocean floor.

Annetta might be the ocean nymph, but you can't breathe under water. Soon, you let out all your breath and began gasping for air halfway down to the ocean floor, waving your arms around trying to get Annetta's attention. Your attempts are successful, as Annetta looks at you with a questioning look on her face. You point to your head and make a breathing motion as you also point to go up. Annetta simple shakes her head and hoists you up to her face. You're curious as to what she's trying to do, but now you're really starting to suffocate. That's when Annetta places you near her mouth.

Annetta wraps her lips around your face and blows air into your lungs in order to keep you alive as you finish your descent to the ocean floor. She enters her house, which seems to be inside a bubble and opens the door and steps inside.

"Well... that was fun..." you gasp as you cough up a bit of water. "I dunno, you seemed to enjoy the last part." Annetta giggled as you blushed in embarrassment "Maybe if you're lucky, you'll get another kiss early." Annetta said as she made a kissy face at you, making you blush even more. These nymphs were really flirty when they were alone with you.

"Well, I think it's time we had some fun. How about we play a game of..."
14.title: Annetta Fish

choices: "..Sure I'll dance, but I might not be good at it..."
"Uuh... maybe some other time, let's do something else."
15.content:
"Holly's been pretty quite, how about we give him to her first?" Betilla suggested, as Holly dug her foot into the ground a bit, blushing. Everyone agreed on this, and handed you off to Holly.
"Alright then Holly, Betilla will get him next then-" However, Helena never finished her sentence, the wind was nearly knocked out of you as Holly darted back to her home in the desert. She almost forgot to say goodbye, but she shouted it as she left the glade.

You gagged a bit when Holly set you down on her table, she flew at what seemed like the speed of light to get you to her house. After you gathered yourself, you noticed that a radio was on nearby and that Holly was swaying about her kitchen a bit. "Guess that's why she's the music nymph..." You sighed to yourself, as you felt a powerful force knock you over. "Oops, I guess that was a little bit to rough..." Holly said as you hit the table top. You got up and turned to see that she must have bumped you with her hips when she was swaying.

"You were a bit excited to get me here huh?" Holly blushed a bit at this, and fiddled with her radio a bit. "Sure... I've never had a little person like you in my home before. I've always wanted to try something..." You gulped nervously at this, that could be a bad sign. However, your stress was eased a bit as she held her hand out. "Care for a dance little one?" Holly said with a warm smile. It was hard to resist a question like that, especially when a pretty woman asks you.
15.title: Holly Luya

152.content: What then should she do?
152.title: "Uuh... maybe some other time, let's do...

info.brief_description: The lovely Nymph sisters of Rayman Origins shrink you down and use you as a play-thing
info.description:
It seems as though the Nymph sisters are a bit bored after the events in Rayman Origins, so they decided to poof up a human to play with.
Bad news is, it's you. (Or is that good news?) However, the magic used to teleport you into this crazy world also effected you. You can be crushed, stretched and many other things and survive!


Rules:
Keep this only between you and the sisters, you can have them all around, or choose one at a time.
You can die, but in this world it's a bit difficult. Remember, you can be crushed and survive though it might still hurt.
Vore and any insertion should be light. No toilet stuff.
Don't be afraid to get a little goofy, this is a crazy world! Just don't get too carried away.
Please, no lesbian things. The Nymphs can shrink to your size, but they shouldn't do that during the story.
Use proper english to the best of your abilities.
Third person only please. (I.E. You jumped off the table)


Characters: Keep in mind, while some of the Nymphs are wise they still act a bit goofy at times. It is rayman's world after all!

Betilla: Betilla is the oldest of all the Nymphs, but she still succumbs to childish antiques like her sisters. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/e/e6/RaymanOrigins_003.jpg/320px...

Holly Luya: Holly is referred to as the Music Nymph. And is always up for making music or dancing to a beat. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/1/16/HollyLuya.png/240px-HollyLu...

Edith Up: As her name might suggest, Edith is referred to as the Gourmet fairy. She eats quite a bit, but never seems to gain any weight. However, she's still the most bodacious of the sisters. Even though she is just a bit plump. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/f/f6/EdithUp.png/240px-EdithUp.p...

Annetta Fish: As her name might suggest, Annetta is referred to as the Ocean Nymph. She spends most of her time in the water, but does come onto land occasionally. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/9/9f/AnnettaFish.png/240px-Annet...

Helena Handbasket: Helena is referred to as the Mountain Nymph. She's also the most rowdy of the sisters, and has been known to break her toys as a child. Good thing you're damage proof...To an extent. http://raymanpc.com/wiki/script-en/images/thumb/7/7a/HelenaHandbasket.png/240px-...
